title.rendered: Codefresh Case Studies: Real Customers, Real Stories

content.rendered:
With any product, it’s important to do your research. There are many different CI/CDs out there, so how do you choose which one is the fastest/most reliable/the best price/etc.? Here at Codefresh, we think our customer success stories speak for themselves. With so many happy customers using us as their CI/CD, we decided to take the time to chat with some of our biggest fans and ask them to tell their Codefresh stories!

Here are a couple highlights:

  • Pismo loves Codefresh’s integrations and metrics capabilities
  • ParkHub has now automated their processes and ship code much faster
  • Tivix is a fan of our compositions and says we’ve “nailed the way developers think about that”

So, don’t take our word for it. See what everyone is saying about Codefresh on our new Case Studies page!
